nodes.text: Cybloc XII was an astronomical object situated in the Cybloc system of the Outer Rim Territories' Meridian sector. It was the homeworld of the Snivvian Morlimur Snugg, a superintendent on the InterGalactic Banking Clan's Cybloc Transfer Station in the same star system.

In the new Star Wars canon, Cybloc XII was first mentioned in the 2021 reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Character Encyclopedia - Join the Battle!, written by Jason Fry. Cybloc XII was first introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 1997 novel Planet of Twilight, written by Barbara Hambly.
